dcc.ufmg.anthill.stream.net
Class NetStreamServer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      dcc.ufmg.anthill.stream.net.NetStreamServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NetStreamServer
extends java.lang.Thread

This class is responsible for handling multiple connections from instances of other streams. It offers the base for dealing with communication among streams and it is based on the producer-consumer problem.

pushData

public void pushData(java.lang.String data)
Pushes a new data into the buffer. This data will be consumed later by the stream.

popData

public java.lang.String popData()
Pops data from the buffer. It retrieves the data and removes it from the buffer.

Returns:
the data retrieved from the buffer.

hasData

public boolean hasData()
Checks if there is data in the buffer.

Returns:
